header.title: Unlimited movies, TV shows, and more

help.title: Forgot Email/Password
help.subtitle: How would you like to reset your password?
help.emailInstruction: We will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
help.smsInstruction: We will text you a verification code to reset your password. Message and data rates may apply.
help.forgotDetails: I don't remember my phone or email.
